se.jguru.nazgul.core.reflection.api.conversion

Interface ConverterRegistry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultConverterRegistry

    public interface ConverterRegistry
    Type converter registry specification, used as a generic type conversion service.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Object... converters)
      Adds the provided Converters to this ConverterRegistry.
      <From,To> To convert(From source, Class<To> desiredType)
      Converts the provided source object to the desired type.
      <From> Set<Class<?>> getPossibleConversions(Class<From> sourceType)
      Retrieves the available targetTypes for the supplied sourceType, implying the closure of Classes to which the supplied sourceType can be converted by this ConverterRegistry.
      void remove(Object converter)
      Removes the supplied converter instance from this ConverterRegistry.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(Object... converters)
  throws IllegalArgumentException
        Adds the provided Converters to this ConverterRegistry.
        Parameters:
        converters - A List of objects, annotated with @Converter. The priority provided in the annotation of each supplied converter will be used when setting up the internal state and the converter chain.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any of the converters was not annotated with @Converter, or if the methods/constructors annotated with @Converter did not comply with a converter specification.
        See Also:
        Converter

      • remove

        void remove(Object converter)
        Removes the supplied converter instance from this ConverterRegistry.
        Parameters:
        converter - The converter to remove.

      • convert

        <From,To> To convert(From source,
                     Class<To> desiredType)
              throws IllegalArgumentException
        Converts the provided source object to the desired type.
        Type Parameters:
        To - The resulting type.
        From - The source type.
        Parameters:
        source - The object to convert.
        desiredType - The type to which the source object should be converted.
        Returns:
        The converted object.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the conversion failed.

      • getPossibleConversions

        <From> Set<Class<?>> getPossibleConversions(Class<From> sourceType)
                                     throws IllegalArgumentException
        Retrieves the available targetTypes for the supplied sourceType, implying the closure of Classes to which the supplied sourceType can be converted by this ConverterRegistry.
        Type Parameters:
        From - The source type.
        Parameters:
        sourceType - The source type.
        Returns:
        the available targetTypes for the supplied sourceType, implying the closure of Classes to which the supplied sourceType can be converted by this ConverterRegistry, or null in case this TypeConverterRegistry could not convert the supplied sourceType.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the calculation could not be performed.
